item.description:
Beginner bellydance classes with Danita will be on Wednesdays, from 6:00 - 7:00 p.m.

This class is for anyone who is interested in learning basic belly dance movement (body isolations) or anyone who has experience and wants to strengthen their movement. This class is good for toning muscles throughout the body and is not a high impact class. Wear something comfortable and be prepared to have some lighthearted fun! This is an ongoing class and does not teach choreography.

The fee is $10 per session.

Important: If you have any physical limitations, please check with your Physician before attending these classes.
item.name: Beginner Bellydance with Danita on Wednesdays
